name: Trends @ Pendo
desc: Build reports to better visualize your Pendo data. Compare Segments, Features and Pages across various timeframes. (Sunset)

name: Visual Design Studio @ Pendo
desc: WYSIWYG for building and editing in-app-messaging A.K.A Pendo Guides. The designer displays on top of the customer's application so they can preview the Guide directly on their app as they build.

name: Webhooks @ Pendo
desc: Implemented the interface that allows Pendo Admins to push out real-time notifications, based on Pendo events, to other services

name: Salesforce Integration Vue Migration @ Pendo
desc: Set-up full end-to-end testing with Cypress for Pendo's existing Salesforce Integration as a way to leviate an increase in customer-found bugs. Later completely migrated and redesigned the existing integration, which was written with AngularJS, to use Vue/Vuex. (Hackathon winner 2020)

name: Hubspot Integration @ Pendo
desc: Allow Pendo Admins to pull Hubspot data into Pendo, which can then be utilized for segmentation throughout the app.

name: Chain Reactions Blog
desc: A blog and blogging platform. Remember when Chain Restraunts ruled the world? Join my friends and I as we revist some of our old favorites, sometimes tasting sweet nostalgia, other times realizing why chains took a hit.

name: Twitter Clone
desc: A Twitter copy as a way to re-learn React
